install.description: RS-Monials is a Module developed for Joomla! Version 1.5.x and for RS-Monilals Component. If you do not have the Component please open http://www.rswebsols.com and download it. This will only work if you are using our Rs-Monials Component. Using this module you can able to display testimonials randomly or serially.

param.name: rsm_randchoice
param.label: Testimonial ID(s)
param.description: Specify Testimonial Id(s) separated by comma. Only these specified testimonials will display in the front end. Insert nothing to display all active testimonials.

param.name: rsm_display
param.label: Display Type
param.description: How the testimonials will display, Randomly or Serially

param.name: rsm_align
param.label: Text Alignment
param.description: Select the alignment of the testimonial text, by default it is 'left' aligned

param.name: rsm_char
param.label: Character Limit
param.description: Specify the maximum number of characters to dispaly. By Default it is 300. Insert 0 to display all characters.

param.name: rsm_moredisplay
param.label: Display 'View More'
param.description: Select Yes to display 'View More' Link at the end. If you choose 'Yes' please do not forget to specify the following parameter related to 'View More'.

param.name: rsm_moretext
param.label: 'View More' Text
param.description: Enter the 'View More' text of your choice, example: 'More >>', 'View All' etc. etc.

param.name: rsm_morealign
param.label: 'View More' Text Alignment
param.description: Select the alignment of the 'View More' text, by default it is 'right'

param.name: rsm_moreurl
param.label: 'View More' URL
param.description: When anyone will click 'View More >>' Link the page will redirect the user to this URL.
